DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine maximum tolerated dos docetaxel mitoxantrone combination fix dose estramustine prednisone , give patient advanced prostate cancer . - Characterize toxicity treatment regimen patient . OUTLINE : This dose escalation study mitoxantrone docetaxel . Patients stratify one two risk group ( good risk group poor risk group ) base number prior chemotherapy regimen ( ) occurrence site ( ) prior radiation . All patient receive oral prednisone twice daily day 0-3 , oral estramustine three time daily day 1-5 , mitoxantrone IV bolus day 2 , docetaxel IV 1 hour day 2 . Courses repeat every 21 day absence unacceptable toxicity disease progression . Patients stable disease may go treatment 6 course . Dose escalation proceeds independently risk group . Cohorts 3 patient enter risk group . If 1 3 patient dose level experience dose limit toxicity ( DLT ) , 3 additional patient accrue level . If 2 6 patient dose level experience DLT , dose escalation stop maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) define previous dose level . At least 6 patient must treat MTD . Patients follow every 3 month death . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : At least 12 patient ( 6 risk group ) accrue study .
